title: For Sale/Trade:  Taurus 45 pt945
postcontent:
Taurus 900 series pistol are short-recoil operated, locked-breech weapons. Frames on all PT 900 series models are machined from forged aluminum blocks, while slides and barrels are made either from carbon or stainless steel. Locking is of modified Browning type, with a tilting barrel that engages the slide with a single locking lug at the top of the chamber area, which enters the ejection window. Unlocking is controlled by the cam-shaped lug below the barrel. The trigger is of the double-action type, with an exposed hammer and ambidextrous safety/decocking levers on the frame. Magazines are double-stack on 9mm and .40 S&W models and single-stack on .45 ACP models. The magazine release button is located at the base of the trigger-guard. The sights on service models are of the fixed type, with both front and rear sight dovetailed into the slide. Pistols are available from the factory with standard or night (with luminous inserts) sights.  
This is a nice gun maybe 60 rounds shot through it cleaned every time great carry weapon never jammed
I do have pics

title: For Sale:  2007 Audi A4 for sale
postcontent:
Vehicle Description
...CARMART CERTIFIED...CARFAX 1- OWNER FL SEDAN...QUALITY PLUS CERTIFIED WARRANTY...FORMERLY AUDI CPO VEHICLE...GREAT FUEL ECONOMY...NON SMOKER...POWER ALL...SUNROOF...LEATHER...HEATED SEATS...ALLOY WHEELS...OUTSTANDING CONDITION...4 TO CHOOSE FROM...SERVICED AND INSPECTED...

The Audi A4 is one of the better cars in a crowd of smaller sport-luxury sedans that, dollar-for-dollar, offers some of the best, most appealing vehicles in the world.

The A4 line is complex, with 21 variants. The key is thinking according to priorities: body style, engine size, front wheel drive, transmission type. All are nicely balanced, enjoyable automobiles.

The A4 2.0T turbocharged, 200-hp four-cylinder is one of the better small engines going, with satisfying response and spry acceleration, particularly with the standard six-speed automatic transmission. It corners like a sports sedan, and high-quality construction is evident inside and out.
Every A4 should appeal to techies. State-of-the-art engines feature direct fuel injection: the cleanest, most efficient means yet devised to blend gasoline and air in an engine's cylinders. The 6-speed automatic transmission delivers truly seamless shifting. Sophisticated suspension technology is augmented with electronic stability control, which can help the driver avoid a crash. The A4 is stuffed with safety features and offers rear side-impact airbags, while most cars in its class don't.

Unlike other tech-heavy cars, the gizmos blend nicely in the A4, enhancing comfort, convenience and safety, and improving the driving experience.

The A4 can be pricey and it's relatively small. On the other hand, you'll have to look long and hard to find a car that blends driving satisfaction, safety, convenience, practicality, great finish and reasonable ownership cost as well as the A4.



Vehicle Options
4 Door, 2 Wheel Drive, Automatic w/overdrive Transmission, Turbo, Alloy Wheels, Fog lamps, New Tires, Sun/Moon Roof, Air Conditioning, Cruise Control, Heated Seats, Leather Seats, Power Door Locks, Power Mirrors, Power Seats, Power Steering, Power Windows, Rear Defrost, Tilt Steering, Tinted Windows, Alarm, AM/FM Radio, CD Player, Daytime Running Lights, Information Center, Keyless Entry, Steering Wheel Controls, Tire Pressure Monitoring System, Trip/Mileage Computer, Antilock Brakes, Driver Air Bag, Passenger Air Bag, Side Air Bags, Traction Control

title: For Sale:  Takedown Winchester Model 1895.30-06 Gov’t Lever Action Rifle Mf’d 1926 C&R OK
postcontent:
Guns For Sale - Takedown Winchester Model 1895 -- .30-06 Gov’t Lever Action Rifle Mf’d 1926 C&R OK

LSB#: 120227WS01

Make: Winchester

Model: Model 95 - 1895

Serial Number: 417855 / B

Year of Manufacture: 1926

Caliber: .30-06 SPRG, Gov’t

Action Type: Lever Action Rifle – Internal Box Magazine

Markings: The left side of the barrel is marked “Nickel Steel Barrel / Especially For Smokeless Powder / .30 Gov’t’ 06”. There is a Winchester proof on top of the barrel and frame. The left side of the frame is marked “Manufactured By The Winchester Repeating Arms Company New Haven… / Patented Nov 5 95 Nov 12 95 Aug 17 97 Jan 25 98 Aug 23 98 …”. The lower tang is marked “417855 / B”. The upper tang is marked “Model 95 / Winchester / Trade Mark Reg U.S Pat Off & fgn”.

Barrel Length: 24”

Sights / Optics: The gun is mounted with a beaded blade front sight, on a ramp and in a dovetail slot. The rear barrel dovetail is filled with a blank. An interesting receiver mounted Lyman peep sight is installed on the left side of the frame. This is both windage and elevation adjustable.

Stock Configuration & Condition: The stocks are lightly refinished smooth wood, showing nice figure and very little wear. The wood is just a bit shallow of the metal. There are only light scattered marks and no splits or cracks. Overall, the grips rate in about Fine - Excellent condition, as properly refinished.

Type of Finish: Blue

Finish Originality: Professionally Refinished

Bore Condition: The bore is lightly gray and the rifling is strong and deep the entire length. There is very light frosting in the grooves, though this is more pore frosting than real erosion or pitting.

Overall Condition: This gun retains about 95% of its metal finish. The gun shows some finish loss from operation of the lever. There is only a mark or two on the barrel, apparently from storage. The frame and lever show very little wear, good edges and only a few marks under the blue; primarily on the lever. There is some nearly invisible erosion on the frame flats, under the blue. The Screw heads are reasonably good, though just a bit worn. The markings are still clear. Overall, this gun rates in about Very Good - Fine condition.

Mechanics: The action functions as designed though we have not test fired this rifle.

Box, Paperwork & Accessories: None

Our Assessment: The Model 1895 was the first Winchester rifle to feature a box magazine located underneath the action instead of the tubular magazine design, which had remained fundamentally unchanged from the Winchester 1866. This allowed the rifle to safely chamber military and hunting cartridges with spitzer (pointed) bullets. The M1895 was also the last of the lever action rifles to be designed by John Browning, and featured a rear locking bolt as in his previous designs dating back to the Winchester 1886. The M1895 is the strongest lever action rifle Winchester has produced, designed to handle the increased pressures generated by the more powerful smokeless powder cartridges entering common use at the time of its introduction. As a takedown rifle – the gun is even more functional AND collectible

title: For Sale:  2007 Audi A4 for sale
location: New Hampshire, New Hampshire, United States
postcontent:
Vehicle Description
...CARMART CERTIFIED...CARFAX 1- OWNER FL SEDAN...QUALITY PLUS CERTIFIED WARRANTY...FORMERLY AUDI CPO VEHICLE...GREAT FUEL ECONOMY...NON SMOKER...POWER ALL...SUNROOF...LEATHER...HEATED SEATS...ALLOY WHEELS...OUTSTANDING CONDITION...4 TO CHOOSE FROM...SERVICED AND INSPECTED...

The Audi A4 is one of the better cars in a crowd of smaller sport-luxury sedans that, dollar-for-dollar, offers some of the best, most appealing vehicles in the world.

The A4 line is complex, with 21 variants. The key is thinking according to priorities: body style, engine size, front wheel drive, transmission type. All are nicely balanced, enjoyable automobiles.

The A4 2.0T turbocharged, 200-hp four-cylinder is one of the better small engines going, with satisfying response and spry acceleration, particularly with the standard six-speed automatic transmission. It corners like a sports sedan, and high-quality construction is evident inside and out.
Every A4 should appeal to techies. State-of-the-art engines feature direct fuel injection: the cleanest, most efficient means yet devised to blend gasoline and air in an engine's cylinders. The 6-speed automatic transmission delivers truly seamless shifting. Sophisticated suspension technology is augmented with electronic stability control, which can help the driver avoid a crash. The A4 is stuffed with safety features and offers rear side-impact airbags, while most cars in its class don't.

Unlike other tech-heavy cars, the gizmos blend nicely in the A4, enhancing comfort, convenience and safety, and improving the driving experience.

The A4 can be pricey and it's relatively small. On the other hand, you'll have to look long and hard to find a car that blends driving satisfaction, safety, convenience, practicality, great finish and reasonable ownership cost as well as the A4.

title: For Sale:  Springfield Armory (Geneseo, IL) Springfield Armory, M1A,
location: new mexico, New Mexico, United States
postcontent: This is a LNIB Springfield M1A, 50 rounds shot thru it. Model 9122 Scout with a Walnut stock chambered in .308. Has a Springfield M1A Gen4 rail and a M1A bi-pod. Scope included is a SWFA SS 10x42 Tactical Riflescope- Matte, Mil-Dot- rear focus connected with TPS Tactical Scope Rings- Medium- Mil-STD 1913. Also included is a TNVC RSP Mod 1 in OD Green, also included is a OD Green sling for your M1A. The Global War on Terror has seen the reemergence of the M14 as a frontline battle rifle. It is seeing service in the hands of the squads’ Designated Marksmen and is proving quite effective at facilitating martyrdom with its potent 7.62mm NATO round. The M14/M1A is fielded by domestic law enforcement professionals, who protect our borders and keep us safe. And, in a less-glorified, but still all-American way, the M1A has been serving target shooters and hunters for decades. But, scoping an M14/M1A has been challenge facing every shooter who picks one up. No matter how you mount your scope, the standard M14/M1A stock sits too low for a proper cheek weld. Everything from taping foam padding to the butt stock to dropping the action into an expensive new stock system has been tried. We looked at the improvised comb height adapters on the market and thought: “There has to be a better way.” Enter the RSP (Riser Stock Pouch) Mod.1 designed to mount directly to a standard M14/M1A butt stock, the RSP Mod.1 raises the shooter’s cheek weld to the proper height for a scoped rifle (about 1.5”). The RSP Mod.1 is compatible with all M14/M1A scope mount systems including Sadlak, Smith, A.R.M.S., KAC, Springfield, etc. It is user-adjustable to fit stocks with trap doors or recoil pads. The RSP Mod.1 also features DMR-specific attributes such as a hidden range/DOPE card pocket that is quickly and easily referenced by the shooter. The Mod.1 differs from the Mod.0 in that a zippered utility pouch replaces the magazine pouch. This allows the Mod.1 to be better suited for other rifles with raised optic platforms such as bolt action rifles with raised rails. The utility pouch can hold various small mission essential items like batteries, strobes, cleaning supplies, etc. Please make sure this firearm can be owned in your state.make me a nice offer.

title: For Sale/Trade:  Connecticut Valley Arms Hawken -- .50 Cal Black Powder Rifle Set Triggers (PIC)
postcontent:
Make: Connecticut Valley Arms Inc 

Model: Hawken 

Caliber: .50 

Action Type: Percussion, muzzle loader. 

Markings: The top left side of the barrel is marked” CONNECTICUT VALLEY ARMA INC. / BLACK POWDER ONLY .50 CAL. SPAIN’. Next to that the serial number is stamped. 

Barrel Length: 28” 

Sights / Optics: The gun is mounted with a front dovetail beaded post, and rear windage and elevation adjustable notch. 

Stock Configuration & Condition: The stocks are wood with brass trim. The stock and trim are in beautiful condition must seen to belive. The LOP measures 14”. The stocks rate in 9/10 condition.  

Type of Finish: Plum Brown 

Finish Originality: Original 

Bore Condition: The bore is good and the rifling is sharp and deep. There is no erosion. 

Overall Condition: This gun retains about 100% of its metal finish. This rifle is unfired! The Screw heads are good and serviceable. The markings are clearly stamped. Overall, this gun rates in 9/10 plus condition has a few light scratches due to storage. 

Mechanics: The action functions correctly, the hammer requires effort to cock. The double set trigger function correctly. We have not fired this gun. 

Box, Paperwork & Accessories: A cleaning Jag is included in the patch door. 

Overall: This is a Spanish made .50 cal Hawken style muzzle loading rifle with a great barrel, it looks to be equipped with a stainless nipple which holds up better than the blued ones. With the double set triggers and heavy octagonal barrel you know this will be a tack driver. This rifle will be fun and affordable to shoot, if you don’t have a black powder rifle yet this is the one you need.

FTF in Scottsburg, feel free to text 8 1 two 8 2 zero three 1 5 three

title: For Sale/Trade:  Handguns, Rifles, Ammo, and more...
postcontent:
If you haven't been there yet, check out Jacksonville's newest (and only) dedicated Gun Shop! The guys that work there are great, always helpful, and make sure that everyone that comes in gets the service they need. I'm not affiliated with them in ANY way, just a very happy customer.

We all know that Outfitter's place has ridiculous prices and poor customer service, Pawn Shops have poor selections and don't inspect any firearms before they sell them (which could blow up in your face, pun intended,) and the Lodge is a battle to get past the Paintballers just to see an overpriced poor selection. 

The New Gun Shop is located in Jacksonville, right next door to Fast Freddy's, has the best prices I've seen (even compared to online!) and has everything from .22 pistols to fully built AR-15's and everything in between. Tannerite targets and all the supplies you could ever need, including bulk ammo. They thoroughly inspect all used guns before selling them, and it's VERY clear that their #1 concern is a happy customer. Want a gun they don't have? They'll get it. Want to buy from someone else and pick it up? They'll do it cheaper than anyone else, but with their prices, why would you WANT to buy from anyone else?

Again, I'm not affiliated, just a happy customer! They're open on Sundays too, how great is that?! Please don't email me with questions about what they have in stock, I don't work there.

title: For Sale:  2007 Audi A4 for sale
location: New Mexico, New Mexico, United States
postcontent:
Vehicle Description
...CARMART CERTIFIED...CARFAX 1- OWNER FL SEDAN...QUALITY PLUS CERTIFIED WARRANTY...FORMERLY AUDI CPO VEHICLE...GREAT FUEL ECONOMY...NON SMOKER...POWER ALL...SUNROOF...LEATHER...HEATED SEATS...ALLOY WHEELS...OUTSTANDING CONDITION...4 TO CHOOSE FROM...SERVICED AND INSPECTED...

The Audi A4 is one of the better cars in a crowd of smaller sport-luxury sedans that, dollar-for-dollar, offers some of the best, most appealing vehicles in the world.

The A4 line is complex, with 21 variants. The key is thinking according to priorities: body style, engine size, front wheel drive, transmission type. All are nicely balanced, enjoyable automobiles.

The A4 2.0T turbocharged, 200-hp four-cylinder is one of the better small engines going, with satisfying response and spry acceleration, particularly with the standard six-speed automatic transmission. It corners like a sports sedan, and high-quality construction is evident inside and out.
Every A4 should appeal to techies. State-of-the-art engines feature direct fuel injection: the cleanest, most efficient means yet devised to blend gasoline and air in an engine's cylinders. The 6-speed automatic transmission delivers truly seamless shifting. Sophisticated suspension technology is augmented with electronic stability control, which can help the driver avoid a crash. The A4 is stuffed with safety features and offers rear side-impact airbags, while most cars in its class don't.

Unlike other tech-heavy cars, the gizmos blend nicely in the A4, enhancing comfort, convenience and safety, and improving the driving experience.

The A4 can be pricey and it's relatively small. On the other hand, you'll have to look long and hard to find a car that blends driving satisfaction, safety, convenience, practicality, great finish and reasonable ownership cost as well as the A4.



Vehicle Options
